meanings.definition: A rare barium-containing feldspar mineral with the formula (K,Na)AlSi3O8 - BaAl2Si2O8.
meanings.english_definition: A rare barium-containing feldspar mineral with the formula (K,Na)AlSi3O8 - BaAl2Si2O8.

etymology.value: From the Greek words μικρός (mikros) meaning "small" and σθένος (sthenos) meaning "strength".
